categories: Category:Ships of the Open Circle Fleet

nodes.text: The Steadfast was a Venator-class Star Destroyer and the flagship of Jedi General Eeth Koth during the Clone Wars.

The Steadfast saw service in the Republic Navy during the Clone Wars under the command of Jedi General Eeth Koth. During the Battle near the Arda system the Steadfast was the location where Jedi Master Eeth Koth was captured by Separatist General Grievous.
